# notAtHome

**Type Property**

Triggers the event when there are no users in the home.

## Declaration

```swift
static var notAtHome: HMPresenceEventType { get }
```

## Discussion

A convenience value for use in predicates on [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMEventTrigger]. Represents the presence of no users in the home.

## Using presence as a predicate

- **atHome**: Triggers the event when at least one user is in the home.
